meanings.definition: A type of table with hinged legs that swing out to support drop leaves.
meanings.sent1: The gatelegs of the table easily swing out to provide extra space for dining.
meanings.sent2: She admired the gatelegs of the antique table, marveling at their clever design.
meanings.sent3: The gatelegs decided to take a break and swung out for a dance party in the dining room.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like the gatelegs of a table, always ready to support new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The gatelegs, like loyal friends, were always there to lend a helping hand when needed.
